    • Method Detail

      • populateProfilePicture

        public static void populateProfilePicture(android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                          String email,
                          RequestQueue requestQueue)
        Populates an imageview with the Gravatar of the user with the specified email. If email is null, the imageview will be hidden. This sets a tag (R.id.imageRequest) on the imageView for the image request and should not be overwritten
        Parameters:
        imageView - The view where the image will be shown
        email - The user's email to fetch the Gravatar for
        requestQueue - A request queue instance to use

      • getGravatarUrl

                            String email,
                            RequestQueue imageRequest)
